links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
A '''korin''' was a kind of enclosure according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. It consisted in a circular enclosure, which could be formed by a stone wall, thorns or trees, and within there was a green pasture.<ref>{{LT1|I}}, p. 16</ref>

The term was [[Qenya]], and despite its similarity with ''[[Kôr]]'', it came from a different etymological [[root]]. Its [[Gnomish]] cognate was '''''gorin''''' or '''''gwarin''''' ("circle of trees").<ref>{{LT1|Appendix}}, entry "Korin"</ref>
